content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Ore Processing Line (around x=-15, y=-51)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-17.0, -52.0) mining iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-15.5, -52.5) storing iron ore
- Burner inserter at (-15.5, -51.5) moving items from chest to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-14.0, -50.0) for smelting iron ore

###Coal Mining Line (around x=43, y=-83)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (43.0, -84.0) mining coal
- Burner inserter at (43.5, -82.5) moving coal from drill to chest
- Wooden chest at (44.5, -82.5) storing coal

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Always check if target location is clear before placing entities
- Common error with inserters - ensure placement coordinates don't overlap with existing entities
- When replacing entities, make sure to remove blocking items from the ground first

### Inserter placement and rotation issues 
- Pay attention to inserter pickup and drop positions when placing
- Ensure proper rotation of inserters to face the intended source/destination
- Verify inserter connections by checking neighbor entities

### Entity blocking issues
- Clear any items on ground that may block inserter operations
- Remove blocking resources before attempting to place new entities
- Check entity status warnings for "output blocked" messages

NAMESPACE

Functions:
- place_entity(): Places entities on the map
  Success: Returns placed entity
  Failure: Throws exception if location occupied or invalid

Important Variables:
- EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS: Indicates furnace has no materials to process
- EntityStatus.WORKING: Entity operating normally
- EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS: Inserter waiting for items to move
- EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION: Inserter blocked from dropping items
